change.changenote: Note: This regulation has been placed in the Regulations Point in Time collection. This regulation is not repealed.

bcl:section.bcl:text: Of the property identified by bold outline on the map attached as Schedule A, the portions of that property that are identified by bold outline on the map attached as Schedule B are designated as surplus property, as those portions do not relate to the provision of revitalization rail services.

bcl:centertext.in:em:
The maps in Schedules A and B are exempt from publication. They may be seen at the following location:
British Columbia Railway Company, Suite 600, 221 West Esplanade,
North Vancouver, BC V7M 3J3, telephone: 604 678 4714, fax: 604 678 4702

bcl:footnote.bcl:text: Pursuant to section 4 (2) of the Regulations Act, this regulation was deemed to have been deposited earlier than the date it was actually received by the Registrar. See B.C. Reg. 62/2006, British Columbia Gazette Part 2, Volume 49, Number 6, page 46.

reg:content.reg:provisionsnote: [Provisions relevant to the enactment of this regulation: British Columbia Railway Act, R.S.B.C. 1996, c. 36, section 52 (8)]
